quest.name: Strong and Unified
journal: M'naago would rather not keep General Aldynn and the others waiting.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Hm? Where are the others? I thought all of you were going to attend?

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Everything appears to be in order. Very good, very good...

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: Enjoy your time with M'naago and her kin? Aye, that's what I want to hear. Too many soldiers forget the importance of time away from all this.

dialogue.name: SERPENTOFFICER
dialogue.text: On behalf of the Elder Seedseer, I thank you for your swift and decisive action against the primal menace. We are not unaware of the danger it posed to our fair nation.

dialogue.name: STORMOFFICER
dialogue.text: The imperials underestimated us once, and they paid dearly for it. They may not be so easily deceived next time─but if we cannot fool them, we will simply have to break them!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So that's why the village was unharmed...

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I don't know why the imperials would abandon Ala Ghiri without a fight, but I'm glad they did.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Rather cowardly of them. Uncharacteristically so...

dialogue.name: MNAAGO
dialogue.text: Well, you heard the Flame General. Looks like we've got a meeting to attend!

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: That everyone? Then let us begin.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: Ala Ghiri is ours, and for a mercy we took it without losing a single man. But we dare not grow complacent─Specula Imperatoris will not be so easily won.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: If I may, General─should we not pause to consider the imperials' motivations? For Zenos to surrender a fortified settlement of strategic importance without so much as firing a shot is...inexplicable.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: We searched the village and found no traps or other signs of sabotage. Suspicious though it may be, I will not refuse this gift from our enemy.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: The path to Ala Mhigo is through the east─through Specula Imperatoris, and Castrum Abania. It bears repeating, however, that the latter is home to a massive cannon with unparalleled range and destructive power.

dialogue.name: PIPIN
dialogue.text: Which means that we will need to strike Specula Imperatoris quickly, both to limit their ability to locate our forces in the field, and to utilize the installation as a shield against attack, as they would doubtless not risk damaging the towers.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I see... Then we have no choice but to accept what we have been given.

dialogue.name: CONRAD
dialogue.text: Aye, that's the way of it. I've no doubt that Zenos has got something planned, but we'll just have to deal with it when the time comes.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: To the assault, then. The main host will commence a direct assault on Specula Imperatoris. During this time, I would hold the Scions in reserve at Ala Ghiri to deal with any imperial forces that may be dispatched in response.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Understood.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Wait a minute! We should be fighting with you and the Resistance!

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I understand you don't want to rely too much on Forename after what shehe's been through, but at least let the rest of us do our part!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: If she wants to fight, I say let her fight!

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: ...Don't do anything too reckless, all right?

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: Thanks. I knew you would understand.

dialogue.name: LYSE
dialogue.text: I won't. I promise I'll do what Conrad says.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: ...Mayhap it would be best if I accompanied you. Alisaie can stay with Forename.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Oh, go if you must. The two of us can take care of ourselves.

dialogue.name: RAUBAHN
dialogue.text: You have your orders. Dismissed!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So full of fire and eager, weren't they? Well, I wouldn't worry too much. They're strong and they have each other.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: At least he spared me the trouble of having to speak up. I wasn't about to let Lyse go alone...
